title: Smart Data Models - ExcSCRX
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simple excitation system model representing generic characteristics of many excitation systems; intended for use where negative field current may be a problem.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcSCRX

cswitch.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power source switch (Cswitch). true = fixed voltage of 1.0 PU false = generator terminal voltage. Default: False

emax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum field voltage output (Emax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

emin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum field voltage output (Emin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (K) (>0).  Typical Value = 200. Default: 0.0

rcrfd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rc/Rfd - ratio of field discharge resistance to field winding resistance (RcRfd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

tatb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ta/Tb - gain reduction ratio of lag-lead element (TaTb). The parameter Ta is not defined explicitly.  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Denominator time constant of lag-lead block (Tb).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of gain block (Te) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0
